human_readable_size[source]

human_readable_size(size, decimal_places=2)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ClientStorage[source]

ClientStorage(sas_uri)

simple client to access and execute basic operations on the Board Shared Storage

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

list_directories_and_files[source]

list_directories_and_files(azure_dir=None)

List all files and directories in a Board Shared Storage path if no path specified, runs at root level

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

delete_file[source]

delete_file(azure_file, azure_dir=None)

Delete a file from the Board Shared Storage

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_file[source]

download_file(azure_file, local_path, azure_dir=None)

Download a file from the Board Shared Storage If content is set to true, return the full content and not just reference to the file

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

upload_file[source]

upload_file(azure_file, local_path, azure_dir=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_file_size[source]

get_file_size(azure_file, azure_dir, readable=True)

return size in bytes of a file on the Board Shared Storage if readable set to True, return in a human readable format (e.g. 10GiB)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
